title: Brain-Based Online Language Learning Design: A Systematic Approach for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language comprehension and digital environment utilization skills
context.additional_context: Customized language learning courses for medical/legal/technical professionals, maximizing learning effectiveness through neuroscience-based online content design

learning_goals: Learners can accurately interpret over 80% of language materials by applying brain-based learning principles.
Learners can design and execute self-directed learning strategies in online learning environments.
Learners can maintain cognitive and emotional engagement at over 75% during the language acquisition process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
